snippet.title: Avatar Generations | Official Launch Gameplay Trailer - Available NOW on iOS & Android!
snippet.description:
Avatar Generations is available NOW on iOS & Android! 
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/avatar-generations/id1579501195
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.squareenix.ares

Avatar Generations is a mobile RPG set in the iconic Avatar: The Last Airbender universe, expanding to Avatars across generations including The Legend of Korra and more! Create your own Team Avatar as you journey across the Four Nations, collecting all your favorite characters as you master the elements. 

Website: https://www.avatargenerations.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AvatarGenerations/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avatargenerations/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/avatarmobilerpg
Discord: https://discord.gg/avatargenerations

#AvatarGenerations #AvatarTheLastAirbender #AvatarMobileGame #JoinTheGaang
